lead_paragraph: Russia said it would appeal the ruling of the European Court of Human Rights within the next three months, but it could ignore the decision outright.
snippet: Russia said it would appeal the ruling of the European Court of Human Rights within the next three months, but it could ignore the decision outright....

headline.main: European Court Orders Russia to Pay U.S. Families Whose Adoptions It Blocked
headline.print_headline: Court Orders Russia to Pay Damages to U.S. Families for Adoption Ban
